description: Microsoft has released the optional KB5046714 Preview cumulative update for Windows 10 22H2 with six bug fixes, including a fix for a bug preventing users from uninstalling or updating packaged applications. [...]
title: Windows 10 KB5046714 update fixes bug preventing app uninstalls

description: ​QNAP has pulled a recently released firmware update after widespread customer reports that it's breaking connectivity and, in some cases, locking users out of their devices. [...]
title: QNAP pulls buggy QTS firmware causing widespread NAS issues

description: Russian state hackers APT28 (Fancy Bear/Forest Blizzard/Sofacy) breached a U.S. company through its enterprise WiFi network while being thousands of miles away, by leveraging a novel technique called "nearest neighbor attack." [...]
title: Hackers breach US firm over Wi-Fi from Russia in 'Nearest Neighbor Attack'
